Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1971...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 2/6/1971 (Going to LA: 2B J. Qualls. Going to PIT: P S. Busby)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1978, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1978, going 5-0, 1.02...
Injured on 4/8/1979 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 9/25/1982 with a Broken Skull, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1983, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 7/29/1983 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/24/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
